getDateFromMillis

public static java.util.Date getDateFromMillis(java.sql.ResultSet aResultSet,
                                               java.lang.String aColumnName)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns the specified column of the result set as a Date. The column is of type BIGINT, representing the # of millis since the epoch.
